label.text: Which of these sectors apply to your business?

hint.text: For example, construction, energy and utilities, farming and agriculture, forestry, waste management and other infrastructure, railway services, street and highway services
For example, manufacturing and chemical plants, food and other large processing plants, warehouses, distribution centres, port operations
For example, engineering centres, clean rooms, prototyping centres, wet labs, wind tunnels, computer labs, simulators, material development labs, specialist testing rooms
For example, repair services, fitters, meter readers, plumbers, cleaners, cooks, surveyors, delivery drivers who come to the door
For example, restaurants and pubs operating as take-aways, bars, cafes, food to go, food delivery, takeaways and mobile catering, contract catering
For example, all types of shops that are currently closed

items.text: Vehicles - working in or from a vehicle

hint.text: For example, couriers, mobile workers, lorry drivers, on-site transit, work vehicles, field forces

label.text: How many staff do you have?
Do you have customers, visitors or contractors on site?
Do you have any staff meetings?
Do your employees need to travel for work?
Do you send or receive goods on your site?
